tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RestaurantReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    restaurant_id INT,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE restaurants (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, city TEXT)
CREATE TABLE reviews (id INT PRIMARY KEY, restaurant_id INT, user_id INT, rating INT, comment TEXT)
CREATE TABLE cities (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT)

CREATE TABLE Review (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
restaurant_id UUID,
user_id UUID,
rating INTEGER,
comment TEXT,
FOREIGN KEY (restaurant_id) REFERENCES Restaurant(id),
FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES User(id));

CREATE TABLE City (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE restaurant (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), city VARCHAR(255), rating FLOAT)\n
CREATE TABLE review (id INT PRIMARY KEY, restaurant_id INT, user_id INT, comment TEXT, rating FLOAT)\n
CREATE TABLE user (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255))\n
CREATE TABLE city (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), country VARCHAR(255))\n
CREATE TABLE restaurant_city_mapping (restaurant_id INT, city_id INT)\n
